markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Iruxi Unarmed Cunning](/Feats.aspx?ID=1059) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You make the most of your iruxi unarmed attacks. Whenever you score a critical hit with a claw or an unarmed attack you gained from a lizardfolk ancestry feat, you apply the unarmed attack’s critical specialization effect.
name: Iruxi Unarmed Cunning
